title: Stuck after Victory/Defeat Screen
body:
I don't know why, but the game keeps getting stuck after I press continue in the Victory/Defeat screen.
I'm in no way playing on a toaster, my PC is really good.
I pressed continue and left it there. After one hour, it still hadn't responded.
Pressing Alt + Tab to open task manager does work, but the entire screen except for the taskbar is black and I can't see anything, so I can't terminate the task from task manager.
Right clicking on League of Legends and pressing close doesn't help either. All I can do is restart the computer.
Anyone else having this problem? I'm using the new launcher, by the way.

replies.body: It just happened ti me out of nowhere where the defeat thingy doesn't even appear.

It sounds like something could be causing you to disconnect from pvp.net when when the match ends, so it can't transition over to the post-game screen adnd going haywire.  I suggest going over each step of the  [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a start to help rule out possibilities.  Hopefully, that will do the trick!
